summary: ALSA: usb-audio: Fix last interface check for registration
details:
ALSA: usb-audio: Fix last interface check for registration

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 28787ff9fbeaf57684eb64cc33e2ec8ceedf21b5, it was introduced in version v5.15.75 by commit 0506c4eae9a924c9181954348f016af738f7327c. For more details please see the references link.
